Package game.actions

package game.actions
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    game
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AttackAction
    An Action representing a basic attack action performed by an actor using a weapon.
    ConsumeAction
    An Action representing an actor consuming a consumable item to gain benefits.
    FocusAction
    A class representing the 'Focus' action, the special skill of Broadsword.
    GreatSlamAction
    An Action that allows the user of an allowed weapon to do an Area of Effect Attack.
    MonologueAction
     
    PurchaseAction
    An Action representing the purchase of a purchasable item by an actor from a seller.
    SellAction
    A class representing the action of selling a sellable item by an actor.
    StabAndStepAction
    A class representing the 'Stab and Step' action, a special skill using a weapon.
    TravelAction
    A specialized action for an actor to travel to a specified destination on a game map.
    UnlockGateAction
    An action representing an actor unlocking a gate.
    UpgradeAction
